hadiths.text: Narrated Anas ibn Malik: When the Prophet (ﷺ) entered the privy, he removed his ring. Abu Dawud said: This is a munkar tradition, i.e. it contradicts the well-known version reported by reliable narrators. On the authority of Anas the well-known version says: The Prophet (ﷺ) had a silver ring made for him. Then he cast it off. The misunderstanding is on the part of Hammam (who is the narrator of the previous tradition mentioned in the text). This is transmitted only by Hammam

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخَاتَمِ يَكُونُ فِيهِ ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ يَدْخُلُ بِهِ الْخَلاَءَ
chapter.eng-name: Entering The Area In Which One Relieves Oneself With A Ring Upon Which Allah's Name Is Engraved
